  var hasKnownUserCookie = document.cookie.split(';').filter(function(item) {
    return item.indexOf('idsessionstate=')>=0}).length
  if(hasKnownUserCookie) {
     
    var search = window.location.search;
    var storage = window.sessionStorage;
    var referrer = document.referrer || 'direct';
    var storageValue = storage.getItem('referrer');
    var orig_ref = storageValue || referrer;
    if (!storageValue) {
        storage.setItem('referrer', referrer);
      }
    window.location.replace('https://www.peacocktv.com/watch/home' + search + ( search ? "&orig_ref=" + referrer : "?orig_ref=" + referrer )); }

class="faqstyles__FaqBody-sc-3gkbtj-1 gbOuBn"><div data-tracking="true" data-tracking-label="What&#x27;s Peacock?" data-tracking-context="faq" data-testid="faq-item" class="faqstyles__FaqItem-sc-3gkbtj-3 jgpEfl"><dt aria-controls="faq-item-content-0" aria-label="What&#x27;s Peacock?" class="faqstyles__FaqQuestion-sc-3gkbtj-4 lhTYMK"><span alt="chevron" class="faqstyles__Chevron-sc-3gkbtj-8 AiUt"/>What&#x27;s Peacock?</span></dt><dd data-testid="faq-item-content" id="faq-item-content-0" class="faqstyles__FaqContent-sc-3gkbtj-6 cbitOx"><div class="richTextstyles__RichText-sc-10kl41a-0 iAZsVc ib-m-rich-text" data-testid="richtext"><div data-testid="richtext-container" class="richTextstyles__RichTextContainer-sc-10kl41a-1 jwKgtk"><p class="richTextstyles__RTParagraph-sc-10kl41a-4 cDWHst"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL"><span class="richTextstyles__RTTextSizeSpan-sc-10kl41a-3 gPmIyi">Peacock is a streaming service from NBCUniversal. With tons of hit movies and TV shows, Originals, current NBC &amp; Bravo hits, and LIVE Sports including Sunday Night Football and Premier League, Peacock is here for whatever you’re in the mood for, from bingewatching to </span></span></span><a class="richTextstyles__RTAnchor-sc-10kl41a-6 gjaopb" href="https://www.peacocktv.com/channels"><span class="richTextstyles__RTUnderline-sc-10kl41a-16 gPmIyi">channel</span></span></span></span></a><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL"><span Premium vs. Peacock Premium Plus?</span></dt><dd data-testid="faq-item-content" id="faq-item-content-1" class="faqstyles__FaqContent-sc-3gkbtj-6 cbitOx"><div class="richTextstyles__RichText-sc-10kl41a-0 iAZsVc ib-m-rich-text" data-testid="richtext"><div data-testid="richtext-container" class="richTextstyles__RichTextContainer-sc-10kl41a-1 jwKgtk"><p class="richTextstyles__RTParagraph-sc-10kl41a-4 cDWHst"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL"><span class="richTextstyles__RTTextSizeSpan-sc-10kl41a-3 gPmIyi"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL">With Peacock Premium, you can stream hundreds of hit movies, full seasons of iconic TV shows and bingeworthy Peacock Original series, the latest hits from NBC &amp; Bravo, can&#x27;t-miss live sports, and Peacock Channels 24/7, plus daily live news, late night, and more to satisfy your FOMO. You’ll also get access to kids’ movies and shows, hit Spanish-language TV shows, and news from Telemundo.</span></span></span></p><p class="richTextstyles__RTParagraph-sc-10kl41a-4 cDWHst"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL"><span class="richTextstyles__RTTextSizeSpan-sc-10kl41a-3 gPmIyi"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL">To watch Peacock without ads* or download select shows and movies to watch offline on your mobile device, upgrade to Peacock Premium Plus. You&#x27;ll also get access to your local NBC channel LIVE, 24/7.</span></span></span></p><p class="richTextstyles__RTParagraph-sc-10kl41a-4 cDWHst"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cxXeCz"><span class="richTextstyles__RTTextSizeSpan-sc-10kl41a-3 cPstXC"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cxXeCz">*Please note: due to streaming rights, a small amount of programming will still contain ads (Peacock channels, events and sports, and a limited number of shows and movies).</span></span></span></p></div></div></dd></div><div data-tracking="true" data-tracking-label="What devices does Peacock support?" data-tracking-context="faq" data-testid="faq-item" class="faqstyles__FaqItem-sc-3gkbtj-3 jgpEfl"><dt aria-controls="faq-item-content-2" aria-label="What devices does Peacock support?" class="faqstyles__FaqQuestion-sc-3gkbtj-4 lhTYMK"><span data-testid="faq-item-title" tabindex="0" aria-pressed="false" aria-expanded="false" role="button" class="faqstyles__FaqButton-sc-3gkbtj-5 dSgShW"><img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," role="img" alt="chevron" class="faqstyles__Chevron-sc-3gkbtj-8 AiUt"/>What devices does Peacock support?</span></dt><dd data-testid="faq-item-content" id="faq-item-content-2" class="faqstyles__FaqContent-sc-3gkbtj-6 cbitOx"><div class="richTextstyles__RichText-sc-10kl41a-0 iAZsVc ib-m-rich-text" data-testid="richtext"><div data-testid="richtext-container" class="richTextstyles__RichTextContainer-sc-10kl41a-1 jwKgtk"><p class="richTextstyles__RTParagraph-sc-10kl41a-4 cDWHst"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL"><span class="richTextstyles__RTTextSizeSpan-sc-10kl41a-3 gPmIyi">Lots! class="faqstyles__FaqItem-sc-3gkbtj-3 jgpEfl"><dt aria-controls="faq-item-content-3" aria-label="Does Peacock have a discount for students?" class="faqstyles__FaqQuestion-sc-3gkbtj-4 lhTYMK"><span alt="chevron" class="faqstyles__Chevron-sc-3gkbtj-8 AiUt"/>Does Peacock have a discount for students?</span></dt><dd data-testid="faq-item-content" id="faq-item-content-3" class="faqstyles__FaqContent-sc-3gkbtj-6 cbitOx"><div class="richTextstyles__RichText-sc-10kl41a-0 iAZsVc ib-m-rich-text" data-testid="richtext"><div data-testid="richtext-container" class="richTextstyles__RichTextContainer-sc-10kl41a-1 jwKgtk"><p class="richTextstyles__RTParagraph-sc-10kl41a-4 cDWHst"><span class="richTextstyles__RTColorSpan-sc-10kl41a-2 cQAFNL"><span class="richTextstyles__RTTextSizeSpan-sc-10kl41a-3 gPmIyi">Yes, eligible college/university students can get 12 months of Peacock Premium at $1.99/mo, instead of the current rate of $7.99/mo.
